channel.title: ops on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in ops on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: LifeOps Community Platform
item.description: LifeOps Community Platform Mission Empower and promote lifeops with the help of the community Problem Lifeops can be challenging when working alone Custom platform to avoid notification bombardment Messages can be discouraging and plain in lifeops community Solution Custom platform to solely promote lifeops Platform-agnostic efficient system with engaging analytics Relevant analytics for competition and communication
item.content:encoded: LifeOps Community Platform Mission Empower and promote lifeops with the help of the community Problem Lifeops can be challenging when working alone Custom platform to avoid notification bombardment Messages can be discouraging and plain in lifeops community Solution Custom platform to solely promote lifeops Platform-agnostic efficient system with engaging analytics Relevant analytics for competition and communication
